Our package include:

1) Popular Linux OS templates (Censos6, Centos7, Debian 7, Debian 7(32 bit), Debian 8, Debian 9, FreeBSD(9,10,11), Ubuntu 14.04(32 bit,64 bit), Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04)

2) Windows templates (Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows server 2016)

3) Control panel VMmanager where you can:

a) instal your own OS using .iso and VNC
b) start/stop/reboot your vps
c) Network usage
d) VPS load average
